title: Microsoft Store now selling original Microsoft Band for just $99.99
text:
Microsoft Store now selling original Microsoft Band for just $99.99 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft is apparently prepared to get rid of its inventory of the original Microsoft Band fitness wearable a few weeks before its successo...
